name: Personal-site-kaustav-haldar
author: kaustavha
description: This is my home on the internet

scripts.setup: npm i -g gulp && npm i && git pull && git submodule init && git submodule update && git submodule status && cd kaustav-haldar-resume && npm i
scripts.update: git submodule foreach git pull origin master && git commit -am 'update submodules' && git push
scripts.save: npm run git; npm run updateResume
